allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Initial implementation of PDFSeed - Payslip PDF splitter

- Complete static site \(SPA\) for splitting multi-page payslip PDFs
- Automatic employee name extraction using multiple heuristics
- Individual PDF download and bulk ZIP download
- Raycast-inspired dark UI with drag & drop
- 100% client-side processing for privacy
- Progress tracking for large PDFs \(100+ pages\)
- Manual name editing for unrecognized pages

Stack: Vite + React + TypeScript + TailwindCSS
Libraries: pdfjs-dist, pdf-lib, JSZip

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: TypeScript errors for pdfjs-dist and Blob types

- Import TextItem type from pdfjs-dist for proper type predicate
- Use data.buffer instead of data for Blob constructor compatibility

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
